mapper.insert: INSERT INTO TRAINER_FEEDBACK (TRN_SEQ, MBR_SEQ, TRNF_SUBMISSION_DUE) SELECT #{trnSeq} as TRN_SEQ, #{mbrSeq} as MBR_SEQ, TRUNC(PT_LESSON_END_DATE, 'MONTH') as TRNF_SUBMISSION_DUE FROM PERSONAL_TRAINING WHERE TRN_SEQ = #{trnSeq} AND MBR_SEQ = #{mbrSeq} AND NOT EXISTS ( SELECT 1 FROM TRAINER_FEEDBACK WHERE TRN_SEQ = #{trnSeq} AND MBR_SEQ = #{mbrSeq} AND TRUNC(TRNF_SUBMISSION_DUE, 'MONTH') = TRUNC(PT_LESSON_END_DATE, 'MONTH') )
mapper.update: UPDATE TRAINER_FEEDBACK SET TRNF_CONTENT = #{trnfContent},TRNF_WRITTEN_DATE = SYSDATE WHERE TRNF_SEQ = #{trnfSeq}
mapper.select: SELECT TRNF_CONTENT FROM FIREMEN.TRAINER_FEEDBACK JOIN FIREMEN.MEMBER ON MEMBER.MBR_SEQ = TRAINER_FEEDBACK.MBR_SEQ WHERE TRAINER_FEEDBACK.MBR_SEQ = #{mbrSeq} AND TO_CHAR(TRAINER_FEEDBACK.TRNF_SUBMISSION_DUE,'YYYY-MM') = #{targetMonth} AND TRNF_WRITTEN_DATE IS NOT NULL

SELECT MEMBER.MBR_SEQ, MBR_NAME , TRNF_SUBMISSION_DUE , TRNF_SEQ , TRNF_CREATION_DATE FROM MEMBER JOIN TRAINER_FEEDBACK ON MEMBER.MBR_SEQ = TRAINER_FEEDBACK.MBR_SEQ WHERE TRN_SEQ = #{trnSeq} AND TRNF_WRITTEN_DATE IS NULL ORDER BY TRNF_CREATION_DATE DESC
